liquibase.change.AddDefaultValueChange

liquibase.change.AddDefaultValueChange Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for liquibase.change.AddDefaultValueChange:
[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Sets a new default value to an existing column.

Definition at line 34 of file AddDefaultValueChange.java.
